channel.title: igroup on Barefoot Rob
channel.description: Recent content in igroup on Barefoot Rob

item.title: let loose in my online men's circle
item.description: 13:11 Thursday 18 July 2019 JST I have been doing MKP stuff for a while. Today I expressed in my online group that I did not want to be there and I do not always want to be there. I am so thankful that I could just let loose with a barrage|littany of the stuff rolling through my mind and the men could be there just to hear me. It was stuff like

item.title: today
item.description: 17:24 Thursday 29 November 2018 JST Just finished four lessons at SCC: Naoko, Liliko, Hitomi, and Yasu each had 30 minute lessons, practicing various parts of their presentations. During the first two lessons, my nose was running like yuck. I used a bunch of toilet paper and tissues blowing all the snot out. This morning I worked on MT3 for 1.5 hours or so, getting maybe 8 frames taken. At this point, I am working on version 2 of the website, which focuses on the characters making the track instead of me making the characters make the track.

item.title: last virtual I-group
item.description: 11:35 Friday 25 August 2017 JST Today was the fifth of five virtual I-groups designed to give leadership practice to men in the group. Just five men in the group, one night each gives a sense of what it’s like and lets men see other men leading the calls. So I will be the leader leader of the next set of calls, planned for 6 calls starting in October.

item.title: Integration Group
item.description: 14:30 Friday 24 March 2017 JST Okay so for a long time I have used “I-group” or igroup or some variant to describe my men’s circle. This nomenclature might be confusing, so I shall now call it Integration Group.

item.title: two new men in Tokyo men's circle
item.description: 09:05 Friday 10 February 2017 JST We had two new men in I-group on Tuesday. Awesome. I’m now suggesting that we meet every week, instead of just twice a month. I’ve emailed Prentiss to see about running the initial 6 week I-group protocols.
